text: @perlmutations @HoneyLight Trump never cared about the Coronavirus. It was all an act for the country because the governor of NY was upstaging him. He knew he had to look like he gave a shit. Now, knowing he's lost support of big name Republicans and not having ego rallies, he's turned to Adderall.
